name: The Kings Destiny
description:
Divide and rule on the French soil - from the Frankish state to the enlightened absolutism. Make decisions about the state, population, taxes, army, and finally keep the throne. And if you do not keep it, then make sure someone will inherit it from you.

The King's Destiny is an advanced historical game in an intuitive setting - be a real king. Make decisions straight from your throne. Remember that your decisions have consequences both for the state and for your dynasty. Make sure that they are well thought out, although there will not always be time for that.
The production combines the best features of Reign: The Majesty, a simple to understand gameplay, and Crusader Kings in a setting of historical details with real consequences of your decisions and the development of the dynasty.

Show that the Merovingians, Carolingians and Bourbons can clean your shoes.
